version_description:
We're thrilled to be launching Camo today. This update enhances the feature-set we're including in the Camo pre-release. 

We hope you love it — support@reincubate.com for feedback.

We're thrilled to be launching Camo today. This update enhances the feature-set we're including in the Camo pre-release. 

We hope you love it — support@reincubate.com for feedback.

We're thrilled to be launching Camo today. This update enhances the feature-set we're including in the Camo pre-release. 

We hope you love it — support@reincubate.com for feedback.

This Camo for iOS update addresses a few issues we've heard about from some users. This version will require a Camo Studio update.

If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

* Fix: We've fixed an issue that led to us having to disable the ISO adjustments in Camo Studio.
* Fix: We've taken care of an issue preventing Camo Studio from automatically re-connecting to your device after a disconnect.
* Improvement: We've made some changes to make presets better. Keep an eye out for Camo Studio updates for presets.

This Camo for iOS update addresses a few issues we've heard about from some users. This version will require a Camo Studio update.

If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

* Fix: We've fixed an issue that led to us having to disable the ISO adjustments in Camo Studio.
* Fix: We've taken care of an issue preventing Camo Studio from automatically re-connecting to your device after a disconnect.
* Improvement: We've made some changes to make presets better. Keep an eye out for Camo Studio updates for presets.

Another day, another Camo update. This update contains reliability and performance improvements.

If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

* Improvement: We've made a number of substantial optimisations to Camo, both when connected to a Mac and when disconnected. It'll run faster and requires less power, especially when no capture settings are applied.
* Fix: We've fixed video corruption problems affecting a number of iOS 12 devices. To take advantage of this fix, you'll need to ensure you're running the latest version of Camo Studio.
* Fix: We've resolved a number of unusual crashes that were affecting users when changing settings or when connecting.

* Fix: We've resolved a number of unusual crashes that were affecting users when changing settings or when connecting.

Another day, another Camo update. This update contains reliability and performance improvements.

If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

* Improvement: We've made a number of substantial optimisations to Camo, both when connected to a Mac and when disconnected. It'll run faster and requires less power, especially when no capture settings are applied.
* Fix: We've fixed video corruption problems affecting a number of iOS 12 devices. To take advantage of this fix, you'll need to ensure you're running the latest version of Camo Studio.
* Fix: We've resolved a number of unusual crashes that were affecting users when changing settings or when connecting.

Today's Camo update adds new functionality in the form of presets, and includes a number of important optimisations and fixes. This update will require you update Camo Studio on your Mac.

If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

* Feature: Presets are now live. We'd love to hear how you get on with them. Email us or tweet us.
* Improvement: We've added a number of nice optimisations to help Camo run faster and with even lower latency.
* Fix: We've resolved an issue where the iPhone's camera wouldn't go back to continuous auto-focus.
* Fix: We've fixed some fiddliness when changing lens position, etc.
* Fix: We've resolved a bug whereby some features where removed on pause, and not reapplied.

We're thrilled to be releasing Camo 1.1. This update paves the way for a number of features — including "Portrait Mode" with bokeh — that we're expecting to enable soon.

* Feature: there are a handful of new features in this release that will be enabled soon.
* Improvement: We're made a number of improvements and optimizations to the way we handle device cameras.
* Improvement: Camo now comes in American English as well as British English. Hurrah!
* Fix: We've resolved a crash that was affecting a small number of users.

Camo 1.1.3 brings an exciting new feature: custom watermark support, so you can display your own branding or name on your video feed.

If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

- Feature: Custom watermarks. You can now set Camo Studio to use your own watermark, and change it throughout a call or session. We're going to revisit this in future with some more dynamic options, and would love to receive your feedback on it.
- Improvement: We've tightened up the onboarding dialog to be more friendly to Windows users.

We're excited to finally be releasing Camo 1.2, which brings with it a powerful and highly-requested feature: audio support.

If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

- Feature: Use your iOS device as a high-quality microphone in calls. On newer iPhones, this includes immersive Stereo audio.
- Fix: We've fixed some lag that some iPhone 5s users were experiencing since Camo 1.1.
- Fix: We've optimised adjustments to resolve some long-standing performance issues users on iPhone 5s could encounter.
- Fix: We've fixed some smaller UI issues users may have encountered.

Today's update to Camo fixes a few smaller bugs, while we work on some long-requested features. Stay tuned!

If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

- Fix: Audio now works correctly on iOS 12.
- Fix: We've made some behind the scenes improvements to Camo to keep it working great.

We've heard lots of great things about Camo's new Screen curtain. Camo 1.3.3 refines it even more.

If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

- Improvement: Some users like to record their iOS device's screen while using Camo, so now we'll disable Screen curtain for you if set to Automatic (default) and we detect your screen is being recorded.
- Fix: We've fixed an issue where Screen curtain could restore an incorrect brightness upon deactivation.

Today's update to Camo fixes a few little issues and paves the way for some exciting updates. More on that soon!

If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

- Improvement: We've made a lot of changes under the hood to how Camo communicates with your computer.
- Fix: We've reduced flickering when changing between lenses and modes.
- Fix: We've resolved a bug which led to slower connection times for some users.
- Fix: We resolved a really odd issue where enabling portrait mode whilst using 192x144 could cause oddities.

We're excited today to be releasing a new update for Camo which not only brings a number of bugfixes but also a brand new icon for the app!

If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

- Feature: From today's release, both Camo and Camo Studio share a new icon, designed by our incredibly talented friend, Gavin Nelson. We hope you love it!
- Fix: We've fixed a rare crash that happens when opening the app.
- Fix: We've fixed an issue where Camo's "Not Connected" text could sometimes work it's way out of the centre of the screen.
- Fix: We've fixed an issue which led to the exposure being wrong after rotating the phone.
- Fix: Fixed a bug which was causing the screen brightness to be too high.
- Fix: Fixed an odd issue which led to the video from Camo briefly being upside-down when changing lens.

Today’s update brings a brand new video to the App Store demonstrating Camo, along with a special Shortcuts-related change.

If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We’d love to help and hear from you.

* Feature: We teamed up with Christopher Jungo, our go-to Motion Designer/Magician, to produce an awesome preview clip for Camo in the App Store. Check it out!
* Feature: Something special is happening with Camo’s Shortcuts support. You’ll need to update to the latest Camo Studio to take advantage of this.

Today's update for Camo fixes an important bug and also includes some changes behind the scenes in preparation for our next major update. If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

- Fix: We've fixed a bug which occasionally led to Camo disconnecting when panning the video or changing settings quickly.

We're very excited to be releasing today's update which brings AR modes to Camo! The launch set contains over a dozen modes for improved accessibility, masking, focus, and novelty uses and are all available free and unrestricted for all users!

If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

- Feature: AR modes are here! Accessing the AR modes is as simple as selecting them from the list of modes in Camo Studio. (Note, AR modes are currently only available for recent iPhones, such as the iPhone XR and newer.)

Today's update focuses on fixing a couple of rare but important bugs to ensure everyone has an amazing experience with Camo. If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

- Fix: We fixed two bugs which occasionally caused issues when opening Camo.
- Fix: We fixed a bug with AR modes which led to Camo closing a few minutes after being opened for a couple of users.
- Fix: The last update led to Camo using too much of the phone's resources on a handful of devices, that's fixed now.

We’re back today with some minor updates to make your Camo experience even better. If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

- Feature: Camo now has translations for Swedish! Jättebra?!
- Improvement: We’ve increased the fidelity of audio sent to Camo Studio when available.
- Improvement: We now include information about any recent crashes in diagnostics exports when contacting support.
- Fix: On smaller devices, the Screen Curtain hints could sometimes be truncated in some languages. Luckily, we’ve since discovered the lost art of text wrapping and applied it to this difficult problem.
- Fix: Screen Curtain will no longer deactivate when Camo Studio is closed on a connected computer.

- Improvement: We now include information about any recent crashes in diagnostics exports when contacting support.

- Fix: Screen Curtain will no longer deactivate when Camo Studio is closed on a connected computer.

Today’s update to Camo has a small bug fix to keep your video running smoothly. If you run into any problems, please reach out to us at support@reincubate.com. We'd love to help and hear from you.

- Fix: We’ve tweaked Portrait mode to ensure compatibility with an upcoming version of iOS.
